original_text: Against him came up Shalmaneser king of Assyria; and Hoshea became his servant, and gave him presents.
korean_text: 앗수르의 왕 살만에셀이 올라오니 호세아가 그에게 종이 되어 조공을 드리더니

sentences.original_text: Against him came up Shalmaneser king of Assyria
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 대적하여 앗수르 왕 살마네셀이 올라왔고
